basics.name: Hasibe Melda Kahraman
basics.label: Psychology Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Melda is 24 years of age and lives on the Upper East Side. She currently is a Psychology Undergraduate Student with a concentration in Child Development.

experience.company: Teacher Assistant for Statistical Methods in Psychology
experience.summary: One-on-one tutoring with undergraduates, grading assignments, and updating online grade records. Maintaining weekly office-hours, and assisting the instructor in the classroom with SPSS assignments. Providing students with test preparartion.

experience.company: New York University, Departments of Psychology & Neural Science
experience.lab: Mutual Wave Machine, David Poeppel Lab
experience.summary: Preprocessing EEG data using Matlab, setting up and assisting EEG experiments investigating naturalistic human social interaction, specifically in group contexts in the classrom.
Recruited participants, collected data, analyzed results using SPSS for The Relationship between Sleep, Eating Habits and Stress study.

Facilitated a variety of small group lessons prepared by the classroom teachers. Worked with the children throughout each day's scheduled activities including Choice Time, Playground Time, Independent and Small Group Reading Time as well as snack and lunch.

experience.company: Private Math, Science and English Tutor
experience.summary: Teaching effective reading & writing skills, and problem-solving lessons. Demonstrating SPSS and interpreating statistical data.

Worked with kindergarten classroom consisting of 25 children ages 3 to 6 to organize learning activites, projects, and assisting teachers with daily lesson plans. Lead the children in several lessons and morning activites.

volunteer.summary: Table presentation of Mutual Brainwave Lab, recruiting participants,  handling consent forms & questionaires, and debriefing participants.
Table presentation of Mutual Brainwave Lab for Brain Awareness Week.
Assiting to organize Making Strides Against Breast Cancer Walk 2014, and other organizational tasks for the front-desk.

awards.title: Psi Chi International Honors Society in Psychology

conferences.name: Neuroleadership Summit
highlights: Table presentation of Mutual Brainwave Lab

references.name: Stephen Canino
references.reference: Melda’s performance and positive energy in the classroom have been exceptional. It is with heavy hearts that the Dragonflies and their teachers will bid her farewell in the coming weeks.

references.name: H. Preuß, Director of the Kindergarten
references.reference: [She] was very popular the children and the teachers. Overall, her practical consignment was very succesful. We can sincerely reccommend [her].
